description: This file sets up an AI agent with a WatsonX model, Postgres storage, and DuckDuckGo tools, then prompts the agent with questions about Canada.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that integrates a model, storage, and tools to interact and respond to prompts.

classes.name: WatsonX
classes.description: A model class representing IBM's WatsonX AI model.

classes.name: PostgresStorage
classes.description: A storage class for persisting data in a PostgreSQL database.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: A tool class for performing searches using DuckDuckGo.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Method to send a prompt to the agent and print its response.
